How to build:
1) cd ~/your/dev/path/cis501-ogehl/cbp2
2) mkdir build
"build" is the directory of binary files generated by make and g++. Other names are OK.
3) cd build
4) cmake ..
The current CMakeLists.txt is configured for compiling Debug version of executables. In order to generate Release version, please use
4') cmake -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release ..
5) make
The final output "predict" will be in build/bin .

Once you have finished the build, you can test:
1) cd build
2) ctest
